headline: How Upgraded Analyst Earnings Views Will Impact Estée Lauder Companies (EL) Investors
summary: In recent months, Estée Lauder Companies has seen analysts grow more optimistic, reflected in upgraded earnings estimates and improved research coverage sentiment. This shift in expectations suggests that the company’s fundamentals and earnings outlook are receiving renewed attention from the research community and investors. Next, we’ll examine how this improved analyst sentiment and earnings outlook shapes Estée Lauder’s broader investment narrative for shareholders. Uncover the next...

headline: Bumble and bumble to Launch in SalonCentric Stores Nationwide
summary: NEW YORK, January 27, 2026--Bumble and bumble today announced a strategic partnership with SalonCentric, the largest U.S. distributor of salon professional products. Beginning February 1, 2026, Bumble and bumble’s products and educational opportunities will be available through SalonCentric’s 850+ stores, via SalonCentric.com, and on its mobile app. With the addition of these new channels, licensed beauty professionals will significantly expand where and how they can discover and purchase Bumble
